alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 4:48PM CDT until August 29 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR ARMSTRONG AND SOUTHEASTERN RANDALL COUNTIES... At 448 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Goodnight to 4 miles southeast of Wayside, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Wayside and Goodnight. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
